caption.text:
Simón Ballen Botero's 'Suelo Orfebre' (BA Man and Well Being '18) is now on show at @kazerneehv as part of the exhibition HOPE, curated by Ilse Crawford and Oscar Peña.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
'Suelo Orfebre' is a community-based project that constructs new values by transforming a waste product from gold mining into glass objects.'
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
According to Ilse and Oscar: ‘Simón’s Suelo Orfebre gives hope that the waste product from gold can also benefit and give pride to those that mine them for others.’
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
@simonballen
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
